pullRequest.title: Add unit tests to org.vividus.softassert
pullRequest.bodyText: Added unit tests for KnownIssueTests.java, SoftAssertionErrorTests.java

nodes.bodyText: no need to make JUnit5 test class public

+/*
+ * Copyright 2019-2020 the original author or authors.
+ *
+ * Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
+ * you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.

+ * limitations under the License.
+ */
+
+package org.vividus.softassert.model;
+
+import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertEquals;
+
+import org.junit.jupiter.params.ParameterizedTest;
+import org.junit.jupiter.params.provider.CsvSource;
+import org.vividus.softassert.issue.KnownIssueType;
+
+class KnownIssueTests
+{
+    private final KnownIssue knownIssue = new KnownIssue("id", KnownIssueType.AUTOMATION, false);
+
+    @ParameterizedTest
+    @CsvSource({
+        "'',     false",
+        "null,   false",
+        "done,   false",
+        "closed, true",
+        "CLOSED, true"
+    })
+    void testIsClosedStatus(String status, boolean expectedResult)
+    {
+        knownIssue.setStatus(status);
+        assertEquals(expectedResult, knownIssue.isClosed());
+    }
+
+    @ParameterizedTest
+    @CsvSource({
+        "'',     null,   false",
+        "null,   null,   false",
+        "done,   null,   false",
+        "closed, null,   false",
+        "fixed,  null,   false",
+        "fixed,  closed, true",
+        "done,   closed, true",
+        "FIXED,  closed, true",
+        "DONE,   closed, true"
+    })
+    void testIsFixedResolution(String resolution, String status, boolean expectedResult)

+package org.vividus.softassert.model;
+
+import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertEquals;
+
+import org.junit.jupiter.params.ParameterizedTest;
+import org.junit.jupiter.params.provider.CsvSource;
+import org.vividus.softassert.issue.KnownIssueType;
+
+class KnownIssueTests
+{
+    private final KnownIssue knownIssue = new KnownIssue("id", KnownIssueType.AUTOMATION, false);
+
+    @ParameterizedTest
+    @CsvSource({
+        "'',     false",
+        "  ,     false",
+        "done,   false",
+        "closed, true",
+        "CLOSED, true"
+    })
+    void testIsClosedStatus(String status, boolean expectedToBeClosed)
+    {
+        knownIssue.setStatus(status);
+        assertEquals(expectedToBeClosed, knownIssue.isClosed());
+    }
+

+    @CsvSource({
+        "done,       ,   false",
+        "'',     closed, false",
+        " ,      closed, false",
+        "done,   '',     false",
